home.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
home.TITLE: open source password manager
home.SUBTITLE: 30% of ransomware is password-related.

session.DISCONNECT: The server connection has been lost, please wait until reconnection...
session.REFUSED: Your connection have been refused by the server, you have been disconnected...

login.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
login.TITLE: Connection
login.LOGIN_ERROR: Wrong credentials or service unavailable, please try again
login.MISSING_PROPERTY: Your email and password are required

signup.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
signup.TITLE: Registration
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_MIN: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_MAX: Your password must have a maximum length of 128 characters
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Your password must contain at least one lowercase letter
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Your password must contain at least one capital letter
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_DIGITS: Your password must contain at least one digit
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_SYMBOLS: Your password must contain at least one special character such as :;?!+-.,^@
signup.WEAK_PASSWORD_ONEOF: Your password is recognized as one of the most common passwords
signup.REGISTER_ERROR: Wrong input or service unavailable, please try again

resetPassword.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
resetPassword.TITLE: Resetting
resetPassword.TOKEN_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the code received by email
resetPassword.MISSING_TOKEN: Code received by email is required
resetPassword.ERROR_TOKEN_LENGTH: Code received by email must contain 6 digits
resetPassword.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Password reset, you will receive a confirmation email
resetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE: Error while trying to reset password, please try again

forgotPassword.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
forgotPassword.TITLE: Reset my password ?
forgotPassword.MESSAGE: Enter your email address and we will send you a code to reset your password
forgotPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while sending email, please check the address and send it again or try again later

verifyEmail.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !
verifyEmail.TITLE: Check my email address
verifyEmail.MESSAGE: Enter the code received by email to validate your email address
verifyEmail.TOKEN_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the code received by email
verifyEmail.MISSING_TOKEN: Code received by email is required
verifyEmail.ERROR_TOKEN_LENGTH: Code received by email must contain 6 digits
verifyEmail.ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid code, request a new one
verifyEmail.RESEND_TOKEN_SUCCESS: A new verification code has been sent to you
verifyEmail.RESEND_TOKEN_ERROR: We were unable to send you a new verification code. If the problem persists, please contact us.

settings.TITLE: My account
settings.EXPORT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Export passwords from your personal space.

passwordManager.TITLE: Change my password
passwordManager.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Your password has been successfully changed
passwordManager.MISSING_PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION: Confirmation of your new password is required
passwordManager.PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_NOT_MATCH: Confirmation of new password must match new password
passwordManager.PASSWORD_ERROR_MESSAGE: The data you provided did not allow us to change your password

emailManager.TITLE: Change my email address
emailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: To validate your new email address, enter the code you received by email
emailManager.EMAIL_CHANGED: You new address has been taken into account. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.
emailManager.EMAIL_VALIDITY: Your new email address is invalid

deleteAccountManager.TITLE: Delete my account
deleteAccountManager.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
deleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Warning: the deletion of your account is irrevocable and all data attached to it will be lost
deleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION: Enter your account email to confirm the deletion
deleteAccountManager.ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to delete your account, please try again

vault.META_DESCRIPTION: Find out how to manage your passwords securely !

createCategorie.TITLE: Add a category
createCategorie.MISSING_NAME: The name is required to add a category

createPassword.TITLE: Add password
createPassword.MISSING_NAME: The name is required to add a password
